item.title: Medpace Retail Trader Optimism Abounds As Stock Poised For Best Day Ever On Q2 Beat, Outlook
item.description: Net new business awards jumped 12.6% YoY to $620.5 million, translating to a book-to-bill ratio of 1.03 times.

item.title: Firm Start On Dalal Street, Nifty Holds Above 25,100; Eternal Surges 12% On Q1 Beat
item.description: Analysts suggest a move above 25,240 may confirm a near-term bullish trend.

item.title: JSW Infrastructure Preview: Q1 Results Could Fuel Next Rally, Says SEBI RA Rohit Mehta
item.description: The analyst sets ₹359 as a potential target if key support levels are maintained

item.title: 6 Stocks With Bullish Technical Setups: SEBI RA Sees Strong Upside Potential
item.description: The analyst flags gains of 10–30% in the short to medium term, provided key support levels are held.

item.title: Dollar Tree Stock Rises As Analysts Get Bullish — Retail Crowd Starts To Buy In Too
item.description: Barclays upgraded the stock’s rating to ‘Overweight’ and JPMorgan added it to its Analyst Focus list.
